item.description:
Werd up, yo.

Feeling a little fat after eating all that food? Well good, you ARE a fatty, and you need to work off those excessive pounds by tossing around a little plastic disc.

It'll be rad, I promise.

Do note that this thing is during the day, and not at night like normal Friday night games are. So please to come at 1 PM, Russell field, and not at like, 8 PM, because if you come then you will be cold and lonely*.

Chris

* You might be cold and lonely anyway.
item.how_to_find_us: The dudes with the frisbee. There should be girls with frisbees, too.
item.name: Apres-Thanksgiving Friday Fun Fest
